charges.charge_description: 18:924A.F FIREARMS-receive, conceal &; store stolen firearms shipped in interstate commerce 18:922(j), 924(a)(2). (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Ct 1 dismissed on motion by USA. Deft is hereby placed on probation for 3 yrs, and subject to the standard conditions of supervision. 3 months home detention with conditions; $50 SPA; restitution of $2,501.63 payable to American West Ins.--1/23/98 REVOCATION JUDGMENT--Committed to the custody of Bureau of Prison for 6 months, recommendation of placement in community corrections center, preferrably Shea Farm, defendant to remain at Merrimack House of Corrections until placement is completed; 3 years supervised release with conditions of: pay unpaid balance of restitution ordered by North Dakota, participate in drug treatment program, enroll &; participate in program for GED.--5/25/99 REVOCATION JUDGMENT--7 months Bureau of Prison; 26 months Supervised release with conditions of drug treatment, no new credit, provide access to financial information, Resitution of $1576.63 is reimposed. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924A.F FIREARMS-Theft of firearms from premises of licensed dealer, 18:922(u), 924(i)(1). (2)
